review: Best service  and treatment. Good friendly treatment.. nice to visit again. ****** *** *** **** *********

The doctor was patient and helpful through the process. I'd gone for a routine check up and scaling and he did a good job. He explained what would happen (even though I'd done scaling before in other clinics before, it would definitely be helpful for a first timer) and was gentle throughout the scaling as well.

review: The doctor is very friendly and makes you comfortable in explaining the problem you have and the treatment required for the same. Post treatment one can feel the real difference and be surprised with your own teeth. Extraordinary work. Will visit again for the scaling process with the same doctor. The doctor's team is also very cooperative and were very friendly. Overall an awesome experience
Thorough in whatever work done. Clean and neat place. Friendly doctor and explains everything  helping us make informed decisions
